short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share links from one browser to another effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Privately share webpages as you surf with friends and family.

*Send links directly to your contact's browser and email.

*Receive new links directly into your extension.

*Google OAuth means your password will not be compromised by 3rd party services.
